question: Which Indian musician has been selected for the Madhya Pradesh government's prestigious National Lata Mangeshkar Award 2018?
explanation:
Famous Hindi music director Kuldeep Singh has been selected for the Madhya Pradesh government\'s prestigious National Lata Mangeshkar Award for 2018. Another famous female playback singer Suman Kalyanpur was selected for the award, for the year 2017. 
The Madhya Pradesh government instituted the award in 1984-85 to recognize the contribution made by the artistes in the field of music. The award, which was named after the legendary musician Lata Mangeshkar, will be presented in February at an event in the city of Indore, Madhya Pradesh.
